bookSourceComment:
起点限免
未经允许分享/上传仓库/发源社区将无理由关闭该书源(划掉)
使用时需要登录输入token或源变量输入token
登录切换男女频发现，默认为男频
非缓存章节1s3章请求限制 缓存章节无限制
🚫下载 如果要下载请私聊我本人或将书名发至群内(本人看到后几秒就好了) 届时就可以随便下载啦(划掉)
非缓存章节章节1s10章请求限制 缓存章节无限制 随便下载(反正禁止也没用)
反馈群：260688553

ruleContent.content:
<js>
token = source.get('token');
if (token == null || token == '') {
    token = source.getVariable();
}
a=java.hexDecodeToString(result)
if(a.match(/juanming/)){
	result=''
}else {
bid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[0]
cid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[1];
t=chapter.tag.match(/\|\s+(.*)/)[1];
if(chapter.isVip()){
	url=`{{h}}content.php?bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid},{"headers":{"tokens": "${token}","chapterTime": "${t}"}}`
	re=java.ajax(url)
	if (JSON.parse(re).code==200){
	c=JSON.parse(re).data
	}else{
		er=JSON.parse(re).error
		java.toast(er)
		c=''
		}
	}else {
   r = String(java.ajax(
        "https://m.qidian.com/chapter/" + bid + "/" + cid + ".html"
    ));
    c = org.jsoup.Jsoup
        .parse(r)
        .select('main#c-' + cid)
        .html();
        c=String(c).replace(/<\/?p>/g,'')
}c
if (java.get("dpkg") == "true" ){
	c=getComments(c, bid, cid)
	}
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
版本: 20250913
作者: 知秋
1. 使用服务器进行中转，不需要挂梯子，但是注意账号id会保存服务器中，点击退出登录自行删除。
2. 临时token口令为 天一团队是倒狗(qq为1070240776和845646066和1484608559)请勿相信任何需要付费的说法欢迎来官方反馈群举报
3. 共享服务器超时请自行切换
4. 文件域名一般为0，无需切换
5. 获取token请点击登录界面，获取token按钮，点击测试/修改token可查询日下载量，切记获取token后请保存，最后选择√存储成功，token为3日有效期，到期请重新获取，切记token变为明文，请勿外泄，异地登录多次会封禁token。(token改为明文存源变量中防止丢失)
6. 共享数据库如有，则优先使用数据库，会员章节开头的图标为🍐，免费章节为目录字数右边为🍐
7. 下载请把预下载改成0-3之间，请求有超限拉黑，请勿大规模批量下载
8. 未登录时，将使用共享会员账号进行请求（若共享服务器端开启了此功能，也可以加群私聊我提供会员账号进行共享）
9. 已登录时，切换共享api接口后，如需使用自己账号的会员，需要重新登录
10. 搜索小说：直接搜；
      搜索漫画：以字母c开头；
      搜索有声：以字母a开头；
11. 反馈q群：755947375，token问题群里找我，或者社区找也行(社区不经常在线，上线看到会回)
12. 接口请求速率存在限制，故设置并发率，批量下载耐心等待

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var body="";
if(chapter.isVip()){
body=JSON.parse(result).data
}else{
var cid=baseUrl.match(/\d+\/(\d+)/)[1]
body=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result)).select('main#c-'+cid).html();
}
body
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  var bookId=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]
 result=java.ajax("https://wxapp.qidian.com/api/book/categoryV2?bookId="+bookId+"&_csrfToken=")
 var charts=[];
JSON.parse(result).data.vs.map(i=>{
i.cs.map(o=>{
var chart={"id":o.id,"title":o.cN,"v":o.sS==0,"t":o.uT+ "  " + o.cnt +"字"}
if(chart.v){
chart.url="http://qd.yyhydb-123546.top/api/content/qd?bid="+bookId+"&cid="+o.id+"&deviceId="+java.androidId()
}else{
chart.url="https://m.qidian.com/chapter/"+bookId+"/"+o.id+"/"
}
charts.push(chart);
})
})
 charts;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
① 发布页：https://jmcomicgo.me
  
②❗❗❗需要在登录页面获取网址❗❗❗

③ 部分内容需要登录才会显示
  
④ 目录>章节URL规则，最后的数字可用1、2、3、4，代表站内分流线路

⑤ 更改发现排列在登录切换

⑥ 复制xiaohan231大佬图片解密，支持了对未加密图片观看

bookSourceComment:
修改host免梯直连pixiv小说、自动翻译非中文小说

获取token还是需梯，通过以下邀请链接注册账号后自动获赠6GB代理流量：
https://v2ny.me?code=z38wdiM4&path=register

注册pixiv：https://www.pixiv.net

在书源登录中填写token即可使用
⚠️需阅读测试版、pixiv🔞限制需在设置中解除

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var sid = java.get('sid');
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) { sid = String(book.bookUrl).match(/\d{3,}$/);}

cache.deleteMemory('pxcjj'); //仅通过正文打开详情，防错
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	let bkn = String(book.name);
	let id = java.hexDecodeToString(result).match(/\d+$/)[0];
	Info['书名'] = '';
	cache.put('pxsid','');
	Info['章节'] = bkn;
	cache.put('pxid',id);
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	let length = leng(bkn);	
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','　　#').replace(']','\n　　'):'') + (length>18?('《'+book.name+'》\n'):'') + java.get('jianjie');
	rr='1';

} else {
let url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v2/novel/series?series_id=' + sid;
//修正bookurl
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{"type":"px"}`;

try {

jg = java.connect(gethd(url));
rr = jg.body();
if (jg.code() == 400) {
	source.login();
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(500);
	rr = java.ajax(gethd(url));
	}

} catch(err) {
	rr={};
	java.toast('详情页链接加载失败'+sid);
	}

//设置解析结果
java.setContent(rr);


//更新更新时间
try {
let tm = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.create_date');
let d = new Date(tm);
d = java.timeFormatUTC(d,'yy/MM/dd',8*60*60*1000);
book.kind = String(book.kind).replace(/\d+\/\d+\/\d+|$/,d).replace('null','');
} catch(err) {java.toast('详情页内容错误');}

//获取书名并净化
let bkn = String(java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.title')).replace(/^《(.+)》$/,'$1');
book.name = bkn.replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');

//java.log('┌获取书名\n[99:99.999] └'+book.name);

//获取书名失败
if (book.name == '') {
	//效果，unicode转字符
	// let ee = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(rr) );
	let txte = java.getString('$..user_message',rr);
	//弹出提示，sid相应序列不存在
	java.longToast('\n未获取到书名\n'+txte);
	} else {
	
	//放入书名
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Info['书名'] = book.name;
	cache.put('pxsid',sid);
	Info['章节'] = '';
	cache.put('pxid','');
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	
	//同名共存
	if (source.get('gc') == 1) book.name='📘'+book.name;
	}

//补充封面链接
if (book.coverUrl == null) {
	let img = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.image_urls.large');
	book.coverUrl = gethdi(img);
		
//java.log('┌获取封面\n[99:99.999] └'+book.coverUrl);
}

//计算书名长度
let length = leng(String(book.name));
//大于18个全角字符
if (length > 18) length= '《'+String(book.name).replace(/^📘/,'')+'》\n';
else length = '';
let jianjie = java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.caption');
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','　　#').replace(']','\n　　'):'') + length + java.get('jianjie');
java.put('jianjie',jianjie);
java.put("bookr",rr);
}
util.xq_trans.call(this);
rr
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[]
if(!baseUrl.match(/actress/)){
	list=java.getElements('title')
}else{
	re=java.getElements('.video_li')
	for(i in re){
		text=re[i].select('a')[1].text()
		href=re[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')
		tag1='🗓'+re[i].select('span')[0].text()+"  ❤️"+re[i].select('span')[1].text()+"  👁"+re[i].select('span')[2].text()
		list.push({text,href,tag1})
	}
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = source.key
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let text;
if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
   let headers = {
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
        "Referer": baseUrl
    };
    try {
        let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
        let sr = java.get(source.key + s, headers).body().match(/(key=\".+?value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1];
        eval(sr);
        let va = getval(value);
        let codeul = url + `/a20be899_96a6_40b2_88ba_32f1f75f1552_yanzheng_huadong.php?type=ad82060c2e67cc7e2cc47552a4fc1242&key=${key}&value=${va}`;
        let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
        java.log("验证Cookie" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
        java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
        let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
        text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', tx);
    } catch (error) {
        text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
    }
} else {
    text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', src);
}
text;
</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let ms = getArguments(open_argument,'tone_id');

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");

}

            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": '༺༴ '+k1+' ༴༻',
            "url": '',
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "推荐排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "评分排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "热门排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
            }
}



JSON.stringify(datas);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let key = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (key) {
            let keyParts = key.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                key = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', key);
                return key;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let keys = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!keys) {
	keys = gets_key();
	}

    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";

            let key;

                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,

                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45

            });

    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
